law.text: Persons registered with the board as "public accountants" by July 1, 1946, shall receive the designation of "Public Accountant Emeritus" and shall be exempt from the payment of licensing fees and the reporting of continuing education hours. No persons shall assume or use the title or designation "Public Accountant Emeritus" unless designated by the board under this section.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 15, effective July 14, 2000.
